name: Location Specialization QoL (Auto-Expand)
short_description:
Adds the ability to set specific buildings to automatically expand and construct additional levels if they are profitable and pops are available.
Auto-Expand button is found when selecting individual locations and then clicking at one of their pop types to open the location specific construction menu.

Load after other UI mods if there are compatibility issues.

Custom Button icon created by a dear friend :3
